name: Happy Place (Phil Johnson)
description:
This game was created for the August 2022 Bitsy Jam, in which the theme was "Pollinators." After looking up the different types of pollinators in the animal kingdom and happening upon butterflies, this was the first thing that came to mind.

I haven't had a lot of free time to make games as of late, but I thought this month's Bitsy Jam would be a perfect opportunity to sit down for a couple of hours and make a little something just for the heck of making it. This game more so than any other I've worked on perhaps is the most off the cuff and ramble-y, as I made it all within the hours of 1:30 AM - 4:30 AM, but I hope you enjoy it regardless! Either way, thank you for playing! And don't forget to check out all the other participants in this month's Bitsy Jam!
